name: STRIKE: Isles of light and dark
name_original: STRIKE: Isles of light and dark
description:
What is Strike?

Strike is an RPG set in a series of isles where Jay, our protagonist, needs to travel to and from in order to stop a potential evil re-awakening!

The game is still in early stages of development. That being said, any and all feedback is appreciated!

Controls

Arrow  keys - Move around / navigate menu

Space bar - Interact / Confirm

Enter - Open & close party menu / Deselect
